thread.title: Keith Olbermann’s ‘Apology To The World For Trump’ Is A Load Of Self-Aggrandizing Bulls**t [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: Keith Olbermann’s ‘Apology To The World For Trump’ Is A Load Of Self-Aggrandizing Bulls**t [VIDEO]

author: Christian Datoc
title: Keith Olbermann’s ‘Apology To The World For Trump’ Is A Load Of Self-Aggrandizing Bulls**t [VIDEO]
text:
TOP 5453562 
Keith Olbermann apologized to the world for Donald Trump in Monday night’s episode of his “Resistance” vlog . (Photo: Frederick M. Brown/Getty Images) 
Olbermann opened by bemoaning the fact that though he and Trump’s grandfathers shared the same name and country of origin, the President turned out to be a total meanie. 
Naturally, his seven-minute diatribe quickly snowballed into a steadfast reminder of why he himself was fired by ESPN, twice. 
He’s just flat-out unlikable. 
WATCH: 
— Keith Olbermann (@KeithOlbermann) January 31, 2017 
“My eyes well with prideful tears that transcend time…”
